title: Hyper-Detailed Creator Visual Persona Schema v2
description: Multi-layered visual analysis for brand-creator matching and AI content synthesis in Soju Wars (100-Year Brand Evolution).

beauty_archetype.description: Granular 'Face & Aura' classification for precise brand alignment and Imagen 3/Veo prompt generation.

pure_innocent.description: Transparent, first-love vibe, 'Girl Next Door' (e.g., Chamisul's core identity)

moody_cinematic.description: Deep eyes, storytelling face, arthouse film vibe, high emotional resonance

chic_cold.description: Sharp, urban, 'Ice Queen' (e.g., Saero's sophisticated Gumiho vibe)

sultry_alluring.description: Mysterious, sexy, captivating, nocturnal (e.g., Premium dark-night lounge/Whisky)

lovely_juicy.description: Fruity, high-energy, sunshine smile, popping colors (e.g., Fruit-flavored soju)

quirky_individualistic.description: Unconventional, charmingly unique, memorable features, Gen-Z trendsetter

elegant_classic.description: Timeless, balanced, mature grace, high-end prestige (e.g., 100-year legacy brands)

royal_noble.description: Born-to-be luxury, high-society, 'Old Money' look, sophisticated calm

hip_crush.description: Strong charisma, street-style, 'Girl Crush', bold and experimental

healthy_vitality.description: Athletic, glowing skin, energetic, refreshing (e.g., Beer or active-lifestyle brands)

intellectual_calm.description: Smart, professional, trustworthy, calm, minimal makeup look

vintage_analog.description: Retro-friendly features that fit 1950s-80s aesthetics, 'Classical Beauty'

cyber_virtual_perfect.description: AI-like, flawless, high-tech, futuristic, uncanny-valley chic (e.g., Metaverse/Saero world)

natural_texture_index.description: Presence of natural freckles, moles, or raw skin texture

temporal_evolution_compatibility.description: How well the creator fits into specific eras of the 100-year Soju timeline.

era_1924_1950_classic.description: Traditional Korean beauty, Hanbok suitability, elegant nostalgia

era_1960_1980_industrial.description: Old-school poster girl, cinematic industrial nostalgia, city-pop vibe

era_1990_2010_digital_y2k.description: Techno, hip-hop, early digital/cyber vibe, experimental Y2K

era_2020_2026_future_meta.description: Modern, clean-zero, AI-driven aesthetics, minimalist future
